data.text:
Pune, August 2014: Globally renowned jewellery retailer Joyalukkas, is continuing its rapid growth plans in the year 2014. The world’s favourite jeweller is now open in the magnificent city of Pune since August 2nd , 2014. The signature Joyalukkas showroom in Pune is located at J.M. Road near Deccan Gymkhana. Every resident of Pune was personally invited for the celebration event, which showcased the world’s favourite jewellery shopping experience. Many dignataries and VIP’s also attended the grand celebration of the opening.

Joyalukkas Jewellery is a retail chain with 95 showrooms spread across 10 countries around the world and is a part of the multi-billion dollar global conglomerate, which has various business interests. The Joyalukkas Group business interests today include Jewellery, Money Exchange, Fashion & Silks, Luxury Air Charter, Malls and Real Estate. Joyalukkas Jewellery is one of the world’s largest retail chains and is present in 10 countries which include Singapore, London, UAE, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, Oman & India. Joyalukkas jewellery currently has a customer base of over 10 million customers worldwide and offers over 1 million choices in all types of jewellery at each of its showroom.
